name: node-rand
description: Node JS Addon wrapping c++ rng for seed-random reproducibility

scripts.build: cd ./src && node-gyp configure && node-gyp build -j 4 --release && cd ../ && tsc && copy src\build\Release\node_rand.node dist\ /Y
scripts.build:dev: cd ./src && node-gyp configure && node-gyp build -j 4 --debug && cd ../ && tsc && copy src\build\Debug\node_rand.node dist\ /Y

author: Chris Boese
